trainer_alpha module

trainer_alpha

trainer_alpha.get_coadd(flux, fmes, vinv, isnan, alpha=0.8, rm=True, Nexp=0, keep_last=False)[source]

Get the coadded fluxes, using only a fraction of the individual exposures.

trainer_alpha.mask_alpha(fmes, isnan, alpha, keep_last)[source]
trainer_alpha.mask_entries(fmes, Nexp=1)[source]

Mask single exposure entries, removing a fixed number of exposure, but keeping at least one.

trainer_alpha.smoother(log_pz, kappa=0.15)[source]

Functionality for smoothing the p(z).

trainer_alpha.train(optimizer, N, enc, dec, net_pz, train_dl, test_dl, use_mdn, alpha, Nexp, keep_last)[source]
